name: ​boygenius
alternate_names: Julien Baker and Phoebe Bridgers and Lucy Dacus

description.plain:
boygenius is a supergroup formed in 2018 by American alt-rock singers-songwriters Julien Baker, Phoebe Bridgers, and Lucy Dacus.

In 2018, boygenius released their self-titled EP on Matador Records, the home label of Baker and Dacus. Their first full-length album, the record, was released under Interscope Records in March 2023.
